title: Stop Utility Service
description: A customer is moving out and needs to stop all utility services (electric and water) at their address.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer and identify their active services.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the customer's identity and confirms they have both electric and water service.

tasks.description: Schedule a service stop date and collect a forwarding address for the final bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the disconnection and records the new address.

tasks.description: Explain the final billing process, including how any deposit will be applied.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the next steps for account closure.
